EventsDetail.Name: Canoeing
EventsDetail.Title: Canoeing
EventsDetail.Abstract: Come along for a paddle on the Snake River
EventsDetail.BodyCopy:
Only 15 minutes away awaits some great paddling.  We hope you will join us for a canoe trip down the Henry's Fork of the Snake River.  If you don't know how, we will help you.  This is a great opportunity to get out on the water and enjoy a leisurely float.

Canoeing on the Henry's Fork of the Snake River
Date: October 13
Departure Time: 10 a.m.
Return Time: 3 p.m.
Cost: $5
Meet at: ORC (under the North end of the stadium)

Sign up at the Kimball Ticket Office or online www.byui.edu/tickets

 

Overnight Canoe Camping Trip on the Henry's Fork of the Snake River
Date: September 28 - September 29
Departure Time: 2 p.m. (Friday, Sept. 28)
Return Time: 3 p.m. (Saturday, Sept. 29)
Cost: $15
Meet at: ORC (under the North end of the stadium)

Sign up at the Kimball Ticket Office or online www.byui.edu/tickets

 

Canoeing on the Henry's Fork of the Snake River
Date: October 20
Departure Time: 10 a.m.
Return Time: 3 p.m.
Cost: $5
Meet at: ORC (under the North end of the stadium)

Sign up at the Kimball Ticket Office or online www.byui.edu/tickets

Please bring the following items for all day trips.

  • Sunscreen
  • Sunhat
  • Mosquito spray
  • Sunglasses
  • River shoes
  • Water
  • Snacks
  • Jacket for cool days.

For overnite trips we will provide the following.

  • Dry bag
  • Sleeping bag
  • Shared tent
  • Group cooking stove, pot and water filter
  • Food for dinner, breakfast and lunch snack

You will need to provide the following for overnite trips.

  • Personal toiletries
  • Water bottle
  • Extra change of clothes
  • Jacket
  • Eating utensils, cup and bowl
  • Headlamp or flashlight
  • All items for day trips listed above

    Advisor Contact: Morris Christensen
